025
026package org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.taglets;
027
028import java.util.EnumSet;
029import java.util.List;
030import java.util.Optional;
031import java.util.Set;
032
033import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
034import javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind;
035import javax.lang.model.element.ExecutableElement;
036
037import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.BaseConfiguration;
038import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.Content;
039import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.DocFinder;
040import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.Utils;
041import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.DocFinder.Result;
042
043import com.sun.source.doctree.DocTree;
044import jdk.javadoc.doclet.Taglet.Location;
045
046/**
047 * A custom single-argument block tag.
048 */
049public class SimpleTaglet extends BaseTaglet implements InheritableTaglet {
050
051    /**
052     * The header to output.
053     */
054    protected String header;
055
056    /**
057     * Whether or not the taglet should generate output.
058     * Standard tags like {@code @author}, {@code @since}, {@code @version} can
059     * be disabled by command-line options; custom tags created with -tag can be
060     * disabled with an X in the defining string.
061     */
062    protected final boolean enabled;
063
064    /**
065     * Constructs a {@code SimpleTaglet}.
066     *
067     * @param tagName   the name of this tag
068     * @param header    the header to output
069     * @param locations the possible locations that this tag can appear in
070     *                  The string can contain 'p' for package, 't' for type,
071     *                  'm' for method, 'c' for constructor and 'f' for field.
072     *                  See {@link #getLocations(String) getLocations} for the
073     *                  complete list.
074     */
075    public SimpleTaglet(String tagName, String header, String locations) {
076        this(tagName, header, getLocations(locations), isEnabled(locations));
077    }
078
079    /**
080     * Constructs a {@code SimpleTaglet}.
081     *
082     * @param tagKind   the kind of this tag
083     * @param header    the header to output
084     * @param locations the possible locations that this tag can appear in
085     */
086    public SimpleTaglet(DocTree.Kind tagKind, String header,
087            Set<Location> locations) {
088        this(tagKind, header, locations, true);
089    }
090
091    /**
092     * Constructs a {@code SimpleTaglet}.
093     *
094     * @param tagName   the name of this tag
095     * @param header    the header to output
096     * @param locations the possible locations that this tag can appear in
097     */
098    public SimpleTaglet(String tagName, String header,
099            Set<Location> locations) {
100        this(tagName, header, locations, true);
101    }
102
103    /**
104     * Constructs a {@code SimpleTaglet}.
105     *
106     * @param tagName   the name of this tag
107     * @param header    the header to output
108     * @param locations the possible locations that this tag can appear in
109     */
110    public SimpleTaglet(String tagName, String header, Set<Location> locations,
111            boolean enabled) {
112        super(tagName, false, locations);
113        this.header = header;
114        this.enabled = enabled;
115    }
116
117    /**
118     * Constructs a {@code SimpleTaglet}.
119     *
120     * @param tagKind   the kind of this tag
121     * @param header    the header to output
122     * @param locations the possible locations that this tag can appear in
123     */
124    public SimpleTaglet(DocTree.Kind tagKind, String header,
125            Set<Location> locations, boolean enabled) {
126        super(tagKind, false, locations);
127        this.header = header;
128        this.enabled = enabled;
129    }
130
131    private static Set<Location> getLocations(String locations) {
132        Set<Location> set = EnumSet.noneOf(Location.class);
133        for (int i = 0; i < locations.length(); i++) {
134            switch (locations.charAt(i)) {
135            case 'a':
136            case 'A':
137                return EnumSet.allOf(Location.class);
138            case 'c':
139            case 'C':
140                set.add(Location.CONSTRUCTOR);
141                break;
142            case 'f':
143            case 'F':
144                set.add(Location.FIELD);
145                break;
146            case 'm':
147            case 'M':
148                set.add(Location.METHOD);
149                break;
150            case 'o':
151            case 'O':
152                set.add(Location.OVERVIEW);
153                break;
154            case 'p':
155            case 'P':
156                set.add(Location.PACKAGE);
157                break;
158            case 's':
159            case 'S':        // super-packages, anyone?
160                set.add(Location.MODULE);
161                break;
162            case 't':
163            case 'T':
164                set.add(Location.TYPE);
165                break;
166            case 'x':
167            case 'X':
168                break;
169            }
170        }
171        return set;
172    }
173
174    private static boolean isEnabled(String locations) {
175        return locations.matches("[^Xx]*");
176    }
177
178    @Override
179    public Output inherit(Element owner, DocTree tag, boolean isFirstSentence,
180            BaseConfiguration configuration) {
181        assert owner.getKind() == ElementKind.METHOD;
182        assert !isFirstSentence;
183        try {
184            var docFinder = configuration.utils.docFinder();
185            var r = docFinder.trySearch((ExecutableElement) owner,
186                m -> Result.fromOptional(extractFirst(m, configuration.utils)))
187                .toOptional();
188            return r
189                .map(result -> new Output(result.tag, result.method,
190                    result.description, true))
191                .orElseGet(() -> new Output(null, null, List.of(), true));
192        } catch (DocFinder.NoOverriddenMethodsFound e) {
193            return new Output(null, null, List.of(), false);
194        }
195    }
196
197    record Documentation(DocTree tag, List<? extends DocTree> description,
198            ExecutableElement method) {
199    }
200
201    private Optional<Documentation> extractFirst(ExecutableElement m,
202            Utils utils) {
203        List<? extends DocTree> tags = utils.getBlockTags(m, this);
204        if (tags.isEmpty()) {
205            return Optional.empty();
206        }
207        DocTree t = tags.get(0);
208        return Optional.of(new Documentation(t,
209            utils.getCommentHelper(m).getDescription(t), m));
210    }
211
212    @Override
213    public Content getAllBlockTagOutput(Element holder, TagletWriter writer) {
214        Utils utils = writer.configuration().utils;
215        List<? extends DocTree> tags = utils.getBlockTags(holder, this);
216        if (header == null || tags.isEmpty()) {
217            return null;
218        }
219        return writer.simpleBlockTagOutput(holder, tags, header);
220    }
221}
